019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesListObject;
023import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesObject;
024import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
027import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.ApisApi;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.CustomObjectsApi;
029import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.EventsV1Api;
030import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.EventsV1Event;
031import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1APIGroup;
032import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ConfigMap;
033import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ConfigMapList;
034import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1GroupVersionForDiscovery;
035import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectMeta;
036import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectReference;
037import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PersistentVolumeClaim;
038import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PersistentVolumeClaimList;
039import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Pod;
040import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PodList;
041import io.kubernetes.client.util.Strings;
042import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.GenericKubernetesApi;
043import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
044import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
045import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.DeleteOptions;
046import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
047import java.time.OffsetDateTime;
048import java.util.Optional;
049
050/**
051 * Helpers for K8s API.
052 */
053@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ShortClassName", "PMD.UseUtilityClass",
054    "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis" })
055public class K8s {
056
057    /**
058     * Get PVC API.
059     *
060     * @param client the client
061     * @return the generic kubernetes api
062     */
063    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1PersistentVolumeClaim,
064            V1PersistentVolumeClaimList> pvcApi(ApiClient client) {
065        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1PersistentVolumeClaim.class,
066            V1PersistentVolumeClaimList.class, "", "v1",
067            "persistentvolumeclaims", client);
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Get config map API.
072     *
073     * @param client the client
074     * @return the generic kubernetes api
075     */
076    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1ConfigMap,
077            V1ConfigMapList> cmApi(ApiClient client) {
078        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1ConfigMap.class,
079            V1ConfigMapList.class, "", "v1", "configmaps", client);
080    }
081
082    /**
083     * Get pod API.
084     *
085     * @param client the client
086     * @return the generic kubernetes api
087     */
088    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1Pod, V1PodList>
089            podApi(ApiClient client) {
090        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1Pod.class, V1PodList.class, "",
091            "v1", "pods", client);
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * Get the API for a custom resource.
096     *
097     * @param client the client
098     * @param group the group
099     * @param kind the kind
100     * @param namespace the namespace
101     * @param name the name
102     * @return the dynamic kubernetes api
103     * @throws ApiException the api exception
104     */
105    @Deprecated
106    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI")
107    public static Optional<DynamicKubernetesApi> crApi(ApiClient client,
108            String group, String kind, String namespace, String name)
109            throws ApiException {
110        var apis = new ApisApi(client).getAPIVersions();
111        var crdVersions = apis.getGroups().stream()
112            .filter(g -> g.getName().equals(group)).findFirst()
113            .map(V1APIGroup::getVersions).stream().flatMap(l -> l.stream())
114            .map(V1GroupVersionForDiscovery::getVersion).toList();
115        var coa = new CustomObjectsApi(client);
116        for (var crdVersion : crdVersions) {
117            var crdApiRes = coa.getAPIResources(group, crdVersion)
118                .getResources().stream().filter(r -> kind.equals(r.getKind()))
119                .findFirst();
120            if (crdApiRes.isEmpty()) {
121                continue;
122            }
123            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
124            var crApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(group,
125                crdVersion, crdApiRes.get().getName(), client);
126            var customResource = crApi.get(namespace, name);
127            if (customResource.isSuccess()) {
128                return Optional.of(crApi);
129            }
130        }
131        return Optional.empty();
132    }
133
134    /**
135     * Convenience method for getting the status from a
136     * {@link DynamicKubernetesObject}. 
137     *
138     * @param object the object
139     * @return the JSON object describing the status
140     */
141    public static JsonObject status(K8sDynamicModel state) {
142        return state.data().getAsJsonObject("status");
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Get an object from its metadata.
147     *
148     * @param <T> the generic type
149     * @param <LT> the generic type
150     * @param api the api
151     * @param meta the meta
152     * @return the object
153     */
154    @Deprecated
155    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
156            Optional<T>
157            get(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, V1ObjectMeta meta) {
158        var response = api.get(meta.getNamespace(), meta.getName());
159        if (response.isSuccess()) {
160            return Optional.of(response.getObject());
161        }
162        return Optional.empty();
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Delete an object.
167     *
168     * @param <T> the generic type
169     * @param <LT> the generic type
170     * @param api the api
171     * @param object the object
172     */
173    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
174            void delete(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T object)
175                    throws ApiException {
176        api.delete(object.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
177            object.getMetadata().getName()).throwsApiException();
178    }
179
180    /**
181     * Delete an object.
182     *
183     * @param <T> the generic type
184     * @param <LT> the generic type
185     * @param api the api
186     * @param object the object
187     */
188    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
189            void delete(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T object,
190                    DeleteOptions options) throws ApiException {
191        api.delete(object.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
192            object.getMetadata().getName(), options).throwsApiException();
193    }
194
195    /**
196     * Apply the given patch data.
197     *
198     * @param <T> the generic type
199     * @param <LT> the generic type
200     * @param api the api
201     * @param existing the existing
202     * @param update the update
203     * @throws ApiException the api exception
204     */
205    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
206            T apply(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T existing, String update)
207                    throws ApiException {
208        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
209        opts.setForce(true);
210        opts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
211        var response = api.patch(existing.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
212            existing.getMetadata().getName(), V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_APPLY_YAML,
213            new V1Patch(update), opts).throwsApiException();
214        return response.getObject();
215    }
216
217    /**
218     * Create an object reference.
219     *
220     * @param object the object
221     * @return the v 1 object reference
222     */
223    public static V1ObjectReference
224            objectReference(KubernetesObject object) {
225        return new V1ObjectReference().apiVersion(object.getApiVersion())
226            .kind(object.getKind())
227            .namespace(object.getMetadata().getNamespace())
228            .name(object.getMetadata().getName())
229            .resourceVersion(object.getMetadata().getResourceVersion())
230            .uid(object.getMetadata().getUid());
231    }
232
233    /**
234     * Creates an event related to the object, adding reasonable defaults.
235     * 
236     *   * If `kind` is not set, it is set to "Event".
237     *   * If `metadata.namespace` is not set, it is set 
238     *     to the object's namespace.
239     *   * If neither `metadata.name` nor `matadata.generateName` are set,
240     *     set `generateName` to the object's name with a dash appended.
241     *   * If `reportingInstance` is not set, set it to the object's name.
242     *   * If `eventTime` is not set, set it to now.
243     *   * If `type` is not set, set it to "Normal"
244     *   * If `regarding` is not set, set it to the given object.
245     *
246     * @param event the event
247     * @throws ApiException 
248     */
249    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.NPathComplexity")
250    public static void createEvent(ApiClient client,
251            KubernetesObject object, EventsV1Event event)
252            throws ApiException {
253        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getKind())) {
254            event.kind("Event");
255        }
256        if (event.getMetadata() == null) {
257            event.metadata(new V1ObjectMeta());
258        }
259        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getMetadata().getNamespace())) {
260            event.getMetadata().namespace(object.getMetadata().getNamespace());
261        }
262        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getMetadata().getName())
263            && Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getMetadata().getGenerateName())) {
264            event.getMetadata()
265                .generateName(object.getMetadata().getName() + "-");
266        }
267        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getReportingInstance())) {
268            event.reportingInstance(object.getMetadata().getName());
269        }
270        if (event.getEventTime() == null) {
271            event.eventTime(OffsetDateTime.now());
272        }
273        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getType())) {
274            event.type("Normal");
275        }
276        if (event.getRegarding() == null) {
277            event.regarding(objectReference(object));
278        }
279        new EventsV1Api(client).createNamespacedEvent(
280            object.getMetadata().getNamespace(), event, null, null, null, null);
281    }
282}
